sentences.sContent: This whole chapter could be condensed into a few paragraphs.
sentences.sCn: 这一整章可以压缩成几个段落。

exam.question: The mayor was asked to _______ his speech in order to allow his audience to raise questions.

answer.explain: 句意： 市长被要求压缩他的讲话， 以便让大家提问。constrain： 强迫， 勉强； conduct： 引导， 指挥； converge： 聚集。

remMethod.val: con ＋ dense(密集的) → 变得密集的 → 压缩

words.tran: 冷凝器；[电] 电容器；[光] 聚光器

trans.tranOther: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information
